'''Mimes''' were a variety of entertainer in the Realms.
document_data.Culture: In [[Faer√ªn]], mimes could commonly be found in [[Waterdeep]],{{Cite comic/Beneath the City of the Dead|25}} and the city of [[Zhentil Keep]].<ref> In Waterdeep, the majority of licensed mimes were members of the [[Council of Musicians, Instrument-Makers, & Choristers]].
document_data.History: Mimes could be found as far back as the [[Netheril|Empire of Netheril]], where on the [[Karsus Enclave]] they were part of the [[League of Noted Singers and Performers]].<ref>
document_data.Notable Mimes: * [[Swen Sigirdson]], a traveling entertainer in [[the Vast]], sometimes worked as a mime after having picked up a costume secondhand.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/91/The Living City: The Swineherd's House|20}}
document_data.Trivia: * The [[Laughing Mime]] was an alias of the mysterious leader of the [[rock gnome]] kingdom [[Songfarla]].
